definition: to hand over to the next workshift

sentences.english: Fill in all the records of the shift of class and State reports.
sentences.chinese: 填写各班的交班记录及房态报告。

sentences.english: I expect communication to occur at shift handovers.
sentences.chinese: 我希望交班时有良好的沟通。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the effect of applicating shift reports in table format.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨表格式交班报告在交班中的应用效果。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the effect of applicating shift reports in table format.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨表格式交班报告在交班中的应用效果。

sentences.english: Keep the baggage room clean in der befe going off duty on each shift.
sentences.chinese: 每次交班前均保持行李室的整洁。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the difficulties and countermeasures in the morning shifting report in English.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨护士英语交班中存在的难点问题及应对措施。

sentences.english: Hand off our Spratlys and Paracels before it would be too late.
sentences.chinese: 交班南沙和西沙群岛我们面前的将是太晚了。

sentences.english: Night down think productive glad to go home after approach.
sentences.chinese: 一夜下来觉得收获不少后才高兴交班回家。
